title: Sabaka (1954, Adventure) Boris Karloff, Nino Marcel, June Foray | Movie

sources.title: Sabaka (1954, Adventure) Boris Karloff, Nino Marcel, June Foray | Movie
sources.description:
You'll Never Forget the Thundering Feet of 150 Elephants! The Wild-Eyed Terror of a Mad Buffalo Stampede!
In India, a fearless young elephant trainer is on a quest for revenge against a ruthless cult that murdered his family. When the local Maharajah turns a blind eye, he sets out alone, accompanied by his trusty allies - an elephant and a tiger, to take down a fiery cult that threatens their land. Will vengeance be his or will the cult's flames engulf all they hold dear?"

Original title: Sabaka (1954) AKA: The Hindu

This film is subtitled in many languages

Director & Writer: Frank Ferrin
Stars: Nino Marcel, Boris Karloff, Lou Krugman, June Foray
Genre: Action & Adventure, Classics


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:58 Mysterious encounters with a fire demon lead to consequences in a jungle village.
09:26 A Maharajah helps a low-caste man rebuild his life after a fire, while dealing with evil worshippers and a loose tiger.
21:23 Plot summary of a 1954 adventure film involving a village, fire demon worshipers, and a tiger named Taku.
27:45 A plot to incite fear and chaos during a festival leads to a confrontation with the military.
34:46 A man seeks justice for his sister's murder during a festival, facing challenges and suspicions.
38:56 Intrigue and betrayal unfold during a sacred Hindu ceremony, leading to a confrontation and capture of a suspected murderer.
51:31 Intrigue unfolds as a man is wrongfully accused of being a fire demon worshiper in the movie Sabaka (1954).
56:18 Adventure unfolds as Gunga embarks on a dangerous journey to save his elephant Teela from a fire demon cult.
1:07:52 Deception leads to a deadly plan to sacrifice an elephant in a village, but the truth is revealed.
